revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Panaphreus, son of Mysthes, 4 dr.,;Palomi..on, younger son of Mysthes, 4 dr.,;Soknoonis, son of Ischyrion, . dr.,;Penaus, son of Apynchis, 32 dr.,;Harsais, son of Apollo(), 12 dr.,;Apollonis, likewise, 8 dr.,;Anoubion, son of Herakles, 16 dr. with the addition,;Pan..s, son of the older Harmais, 20 dr.,;M.[], likewise, 20 dr.,;Ann[], likewise, 28 dr. with the addition,;Apollonis, son of Theon the slave, 4 dr.,;Atommys, son of Petosiris, 8 dr.,;Pachnoubis, son of Petosiris, 8 dr.,;Ammonis, son of Mysthes, son of Pouis, 8 dr.,;Dioskoros, son of Petosiris, 8 dr.,;Horion, son of Leonidas, 8 dr.,;M..ous, son of Papontos, 44 dr.,;Kallisytr[....], son of Phanth(), [1]2 dr.,;......s, son of Peteuchos the embalmer, 4 dr.,;Harpamos, likewise, coppersmith, 8 dr.,;Pnepheros, son of Psenobastis, 16 dr.,;A....., son of Herakleides the embalmer, 4 dr.,;P.[], son of Anno(), 24 dr. with the addition,;Pnepheros, son of Petosiris, son of Lakon, 16 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Petesouchos, son of Ps(), 16 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Aorsis the younger, 8 dr.,;Herakleides, son of Orsenouphis, 8 dr.,;Orsenouphis, likewise son of Apato(), 4 dr.,;Pnepheros, son of Orsenouphis, 4 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Nekpheros, son of Aron, 4 dr.,;Sisois, son of Zoilos, 4 dr.,;Psenos. . . . ., son of Petermouthis, 20 dr.,;Pe. .[], son of Nekpheros, 24 dr.,;Pet.[..]s, son of Nekpheros, 4 dr. with the addition,;.ea.tes, son of Pnepheros, son of Nekpheros, 8 dr.
